channel.title: 639 Yell Command?
channel.description:
Ok, so i've been working on my 639 server recently, and took a break for two to three months and totally forgot how to fix my ::yell command, to where everyone on the server can use it. haha now i know most of you are probably thinking "what an idoit", haha and i would have to agree, but i don't feel like looking all over the place to figure this out, since it's probably not that big of a topic. So if anyone could help me out that would be amazing! A picture of the command will be below! :)
Thanks, for who ever can help me! Haha i feel like such an idoit right now :P
http://gyazo.com/4056ccd8e9938851ac4a208895892d57
[BTW!!] - The server + client are Dementhium if that helps, or makes a difference.
